name: project-documentation-generator
description: This program makes .md and .json files that contain useful meta data to include in git repositories for future reference.
author: Aaron Shiffler, Ryan Gewondjan

byui.title: project-documentation-generator
byui.description: This program makes .md and .json files that contain useful meta data to include in git repositories for future reference.
byui.purpose: This project helps team members retroactively generate this data in a uniform manner to quickly add and commit these files to existing projects they are working on.
